name: html-fetcher
description: Obsidian plugin for fetching and converting webpages to markdown notes

scripts.dev-build: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && cp main.js manifest.json 'Test Vault/.obsidian/plugins/html-fetcher'
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.package: npm run build && mkdir -p html-fetcher && cp main.js manifest.json html-fetcher/ && zip html-fetcher.zip html-fetcher/
